title: Hold Me Tight
lyrics: It feel s so right now, hold me ti ght, Te ll me I'm the only one, And th en I mi ght, Nev er be the lonely one. So hold me tight, to-night, to-night, It's yo u, Y ou you you - oo-oo - oo-o o. Don't know what it means t o hold you tig ht, Be ing here alone to night with y ou,
